name: Strac
long_description: Strac DLP (Data Loss Prevention) is an AI Company that eliminates data leaks from SaaS, Cloud, Endpoints  and Generative AI apps by automatically detecting and remediating the most sensitive customer data like  SSN, DL, Passport, Bank Statements, etc. across all communication channels like Office 365, Gmail, Slack, Onedrive, Google Drive, Zendesk, Salesforce, ChatGPT, Chrome, Jira, Web Applications, Mac, Endpoints, etc.
one_liner: Remove PCI, PHI, PII Leaks from SaaS, Cloud, Endpoints & Generative AI
